title: New York Seeks Ban on A.I.-Generated Images of Candidates
description: Last year, the Cuomo campaign released a video created by artificial intelligence that depicted Zohran Mamdani eating rice with his hands. Gov. Kathy Hochul wants to ban such tactics.
content:
As the use of images created by artificial intelligence explodes, Gov. Kathy Hochul of New York announced on Sunday that she would seek limits on how political campaigns can employ the technology before elections.

title: World’s first AI minister explains why those aged 40-60 have a unique edge
description: Omar Sultan Al Olama, the UAE’s youngest minister and the world’s first minister of artificial intelligence, recently shared his views on how artificial intelligence (AI) is reshaping jobs, human cognition, and generational strengths. He was speaking with Zerodha co-founder Nikhil Kamath at the India Global Forum in Dubai.

title: Are IIT faculty ready to teach AI at scale: Here's what IITs say
description: As artificial intelligence reshapes engineering education, India’s IITs face tough questions about whether they are nurturing original thinkers or merely training students to use fast-changing tools. With AI now a core skill, faculty readiness, curriculum agility and large-scale upskilling are under sharp focus.

title: Mahayuti unveils BMC poll manifesto: 'Flood-free Mumbai', 50% concession on bus fares for women, more
description: A key focus of the manifesto is the use of artificial intelligence (AI) to curb corruption, speed up clearances and improve service delivery
content:

title: The horrific 'nude' AI pictures being posted online without consent
description: An artificial intelligence chatbot within X has been used in recent days to create sexualised and nude images of adults and children without consent. Urgent calls have now been made for action to be taken against the 'abusive' tool on the popular platform. James Holt reports.

title: MCMC blocks Grok AI chatbot over sexually explicit content
description: PETALING JAYA: The Grok Artificial Intelligence (AI) chatbot has been temporarily blocked in Malaysia effective Jan 11.
content:
PETALING JAYA: The Grok Artificial Intelligence (AI) chatbot has been temporarily blocked in Malaysia effective Jan 11.

title: AI toymakers urge caution at CES after chatbot teddy bear sparks alarm
description: Toymakers at CES urged caution over AI-powered toys after a watchdog report found chatbot teddy bears giving sexual and violent advice, raising concerns over child safety, privacy, data sharing and the risks of unchecked generative artificial intelligence in playrooms.

title: Motley Fool: Microsoft for the long term
description: Microsoft (Nasdaq: MSFT) is a ubiquitous brand in computing, and that works to its advantage in the age of artificial intelligence. Hundreds of millions of people use Microsoft Office and Windows-based software products, providing a large installed base of users to help pay back its AI investments.
